vernac_cmds: exists ([ p:point_set RTop * point_set RTop | let (x',y'):=p in In (open_ball _ R_metric x (r/2)) x' /\ In (open_ball _ R_metric y (r/2)) y' ]).
replace r with (r/2+r/2) by field; apply Rplus_lt_compat; trivial.

Corollary sum_continuous: forall (X:TopologicalSpace) (f g:point_set X -> point_set RTop) (x:point_set X), continuous_at f x -> continuous_at g x -> continuous_at (fun x:point_set X => f x + g x) x (Y:=RTop).
pose proof (sum_continuous _ (fun p:point_set (ProductTopology2 RTop RTop) => fst p) (fun p:point_set (ProductTopology2 RTop RTop) => -snd p) (x,y)).
match goal with |- continuous_at ?f ?q => replace f with (fun p:R*R => fst p + - snd p) end.

Corollary diff_continuous: forall (X:TopologicalSpace) (f g:point_set X -> point_set RTop) (x:point_set X), continuous_at f x -> continuous_at g x -> continuous_at (fun x:point_set X => f x - g x) x (Y:=RTop).
Lemma const_multiple_func_continuous: forall c:R, continuous (fun x:R => c*x) (X:=RTop) (Y:=RTop).
apply metric_space_fun_continuity with R_metric R_metric; try apply RTop_metrization.
replace eps with (Rabs c * (eps / Rabs c)); try field.

Corollary const_multiple_continuous: forall (X:TopologicalSpace) (f:point_set X -> point_set RTop) (c:R) (x:point_set X), continuous_at f x -> continuous_at (fun x:point_set X => c * f x) x (Y:=RTop).
replace (0*0) with 0 by auto with real.
exists (characteristic_function_to_ensemble (fun p:point_set RTop * point_set RTop => let (x',y'):=p in In (open_ball _ R_metric 0 r) x' /\ In (open_ball _ R_metric 0 1) y' )).
replace (x*y-0) with (x*y) by auto with real.
replace (x-0) with x in H1 by auto with real.
replace (y-0) with y in H2 by auto with real.
replace r with (r*1) by auto with real.
match goal with |- continuous_at ?f ?q => replace f with (fun p:point_set RTop*point_set RTop => (fst p - x0) * (snd p - y0) + y0 * fst p + x0 * snd p - x0 * y0) end.

Corollary product_continuous: forall (X:TopologicalSpace) (f g:point_set X -> point_set RTop) (x:point_set X), continuous_at f x -> continuous_at g x -> continuous_at (fun x:point_set X => f x * g x) x (Y:=RTop).
apply metric_space_fun_continuity with R_metric R_metric; try apply RTop_metrization.
replace (1 * / 2) with (/ 2) in H1 by auto with real.
replace (/ x' - / 1) with ((1 - x') * / x'); try field.
Lemma Rinv_continuous: forall x0:R, x0<>0 -> continuous_at Rinv x0 (X:=RTop) (Y:=RTop).
apply continuous_at_is_local with (f:=fun x:R => /x0 * Rinv (/x0 * x)) (N:=Complement (Singleton 0)).
Lemma Rdiv_continuous: forall x y:R, y <> 0 -> continuous_at_2arg Rdiv x y (X:=RTop) (Y:=RTop) (Z:=RTop).
match goal with |- continuous_at ?f ?q => replace f with (fun p:point_set RTop * point_set RTop => fst p * / snd p) end.

Corollary quotient_continuous: forall (X:TopologicalSpace) (f g:point_set X -> point_set RTop) (x0:point_set X), continuous_at f x0 -> continuous_at g x0 -> g x0 <> 0 -> continuous_at (fun x:point_set X => f x / g x) x0 (Y:=RTop).
apply metric_space_fun_continuity with R_metric R_metric; try apply RTop_metrization.
Lemma open_interval_homeomorphic_to_real_line: let U:=characteristic_function_to_ensemble (fun x:point_set RTop => -1 < x < 1) in homeomorphic RTop (SubspaceTopology U).
apply Rlt_le_trans with 1; auto with real.
pattern 1 at 1; replace 1 with (1+0) by auto with real.
pattern 1 at 2; replace 1 with ((1 + Rabs x) * / (1 + Rabs x)).
pattern (Rabs x) at 1; replace (Rabs x) with (0 + Rabs x); auto with real.
assert (forall x:point_set RTop, In U (x / (1 + Rabs x))).
exists (fun x:point_set (SubspaceTopology U) => (subspace_inc U x) / (1 - Rabs (subspace_inc U x))).
apply Rlt_le_trans with 1; auto with real.
pattern 1 at 1; replace 1 with (1+0) by auto with real.
replace 0 with (x*0) by auto with real.
replace 0 with (x*0) by auto with real.

command: apply metric_space_fun_continuity with R_metric R_metric; try apply RTop_metrization.
replace eps with (Rabs c * (eps / Rabs c)); try field.
replace (0*0) with 0 by auto with real.
exists (characteristic_function_to_ensemble (fun p:point_set RTop * point_set RTop => let (x',y'):=p in In (open_ball _ R_metric 0 r) x' /\ In (open_ball _ R_metric 0 1) y' )).
replace (x*y-0) with (x*y) by auto with real.
replace (x-0) with x in H1 by auto with real.
replace (y-0) with y in H2 by auto with real.
replace r with (r*1) by auto with real.
match goal with |- continuous_at ?f ?q => replace f with (fun p:point_set RTop*point_set RTop => (fst p - x0) * (snd p - y0) + y0 * fst p + x0 * snd p - x0 * y0) end.
apply metric_space_fun_continuity with R_metric R_metric; try apply RTop_metrization.
replace (1 * / 2) with (/ 2) in H1 by auto with real.
replace (/ x' - / 1) with ((1 - x') * / x'); try field.
apply continuous_at_is_local with (f:=fun x:R => /x0 * Rinv (/x0 * x)) (N:=Complement (Singleton 0)).
match goal with |- continuous_at ?f ?q => replace f with (fun p:point_set RTop * point_set RTop => fst p * / snd p) end.
apply metric_space_fun_continuity with R_metric R_metric; try apply RTop_metrization.
